original_title: Joys of Waiting for the Broadway Bus #3
overview: "3D is rather a slighting way to speak of deep space. I enjoyed AVATAR and HUGO, though not much else among the movies I’ve seen in illusionary depth. They place things in depth but don’t go at depth as a realm to be investigated, toyed with; no mindbenders other than story. Cezanne, Cubism, never happened. This movie begins to play with possibility, with things only sometimes appearing real." - Ken Jacobs
title: Joys of Waiting for the Broadway Bus #3
